description: {{nihongo|'''Yui Mizuno'''|水野 由結|Mizuno Yui|born June 20, 1999}}, formerly known by her stage name '''Yuimetal''', is a Japanese musician, singer, and dancer. She is a former member of the [[kawaii metal]] group [[Babymetal]] and the idol group [[Sakura Gakuin]]. In October 2018, she left Babymetal due to an undisclosed illness. She is managed by the [[Amuse Inc.]] talent agency.
